module load BWA
src=../locmetsamples_concat
bwa_db=correlophus_sarasinorum_assembly.fasta
bwa index $bwa_db
for sample in $files
do echo $sample
    bwa mem -t 2 $bwa_db $src/${sample}.fq.gz  |   samtools view -b | samtools sort --threads 4 > ${sample}.bam
done
